Docs.summary: The System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration namespace contains classes that provide configuration for Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) applications that use the WS-Federation protocol. The classes in this namespace represent settings under the [\<system.identityModel.services\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.identityModel.services%3E.md) element. The namespace also contains some of the classes that are used to configure WS-Federation. Classes that configure other service and application settings, such as security token handlers, are contained primarily in the namespace. These settings appear under the [\<identityConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CidentityConfiguration%3E.md) element in a configuration file.
